Changeset.Change: Added HostFinderPlugin that finds the hostname and the port of the ghn from "deploy.properties" file that comes with the (RESTful) service
FieldUpdaterPlugin changed to not recreate deleted searchables and presentables in updatedField
FieldUpdaterPlugin changed to add searchable and presentable also in updatedField
FieldUpdaterPlugin no longer uses default store method. updated fields are stored correctly using the datastore selected by the plugin
First release. Library containing model independent plugins used in the gCube environment. Field updater plugin is of type POST_RETRIEVE. DataSource manager plugin is of type PRE_UPDATE.
